channel.title: Changing attack speed and skill rates
channel.description:
Hello! i have a server with the tesscape sources (317) and i want know where i can change the speed attack be'cuz i hit like 4 times in one second and i want change that... also my skills up too fast and i want change that too, what i need edit for that?
PD. also what i need change for change the loot of monsters?¿
